sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The countdown to Sunday's polls in Greece has begun, with political leaders delivering their final speeches in an attempt to win over undecided voters.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The current leader insisted only a stable and independent government can lead Greece into the future. και προοπτική. Και αυτός είναι ο λόγος που φουντώνει μέρα με τη μέρα και διευρύνεται το ενωτικό ρεύμα που έφερε μπροστά την Ελλάδα πριν από τέσσερα χρόνια.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Ο κυβερνήτης της αξιωτικής οικογένειας ορίζει τους ανθρώπους να αυστούν το κυβερνήμα και να δημιουργήσουν μια προγραμματική αγωνία της συνεργασίας.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Επίσης, είπε ότι η αγωνία του είχε γνώριστο και αφιερωμένο. said that his administration had been honest and fair.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: As world leaders and guests including the UN and IMF chiefs gathered in Japan for a

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: G7 summit, the war of words and actions with Russia ramped up again.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Delegates to the meeting visited the Itsukushima Shrine near Hiroshima, where UK Prime Minister Rishi Sunak told reporters he had one thing to say to Russian President Vladimir Putin.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: My message to Putin is straightforward. We're not going away. Russia has conducted an illegal, unprovoked act of aggression by invading Ukraine, and Russia needs to know that we and other countries remain steadfast in our resolve to support Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: But speaking by video to the Council on Interethnic Relations,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Putin had a message for the collective West, who he accused of trying to divide the Russian people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: We see how aggressive the external pressure is on Russia, on all our society.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Almost the entire arsenal is directed against us.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Economic, military, political, and information propaganda is disbanded.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: New sanctions on Russia announced by leaders included a limit to trade in Russian diamonds, but experts said it would do little to starve Russia's war machine. A court in Slovakia has acquitted business tycoon Marianne Kocina for the second time on charges of conspiring to murder journalist Jan Kuciak.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: But the hearing in Pezinoch convicted co-defendant Alena Zhuzhova of ordering and planning Kuciak's murder in February 2018.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: She receives a 25-year prison sentence.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The pair were both acquitted at the original trial, which began in 2019, and Friday's decision comes after an appeal was launched in 2021.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Kizorba's lawyers will still have the right to appeal to the country's Supreme Court.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The killing of Kusiak is among the most shocking murders of journalists in recent European history, along with that of Maltese reporter Daphne Caruana Galizia. Both were targeted for investigating ties between government officials and criminal groups.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: As the G7 summit focuses on a perceived threat from Beijing's growing influence, Chinese President Xi Jinping unveiled a grand plan for Central Asia's development.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The parallel two-day gathering in Xi'an with leaders from five Central Asian countries

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: wrapped up on Friday, with President Xi taking a swipe at the West's attempts to deter Beijing's economic and political developments.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: We must work together to establish global security initiative, to resist external forces interfering with the internal affairs of the region by promising state-of-the-art highways and railway lines, as well as speeding up construction of pipelines to supply gas.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It wants to take on a new leadership role in the region that has traditionally been a Russian sphere of influence.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The Central Asian Summit was attended by leaders from Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan, Turkmenistan and Uzbekistan.
